targets.query:
import "sampledata"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IPS7100")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0 and r._value < 100000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm10_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm5_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "RG15")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rainPerInterval")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] <= 100.0) //
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MLRPS001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "batteryCurrent")
      |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
